mn37:8.6: samupabyūḷho → samupabbūḷho (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); samūpabbūḷho (si); samūpabyuḷho (sya-all, km)
mn37:14.6: suladdhaṃ te, mārisa → etthantare pāṭho cck, si, pts-vp-pli1ed potthakesu
mn37:15.2: bhagavā ahu → ahunaññeva (si, km); āhunaññeva (sya-all); ahu taññeva (pts-vp-pli1ed) | bhāsitā”ti → bhāsitā (bj); abhāsitthāti (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
